casebody.data:
Louis LEAVITT, Petitioner, v. FEDERAL TRADE COMMISSION, Respondent. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. December 9, 1926.) No. 11. Alexander A. Mayper, of New York City, for petitioner. Bayard T. Haines, Adrien F. Busiek, and G. E. Rowland, all of Washington, D. C., for respondent.

Before HOUGH, HAND, and MACK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed in open court.
